attributes.review: This app does not work. Ever since I downloaded it, I haven’t been able to open the app without major issues. I’ve just been trying to stay updated with the Trump campaign, but half of the time the app doesn’t even open, and it’s even started to glitch my phone. Waste of space. The President of America can’t even establish a proper app.
attributes.title: Waste of space

attributes.review: Took several hours to download and then when I opened it it asked for my address and my SSN. Not sure why an app needs this. Several bugs that made my phone freeze and I got constant unnecessary notifications. I mad a profile picture and they insulted me after saving it. Came to my house and spat in my face. Absolutely disgusting and disappointed.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
so today i decided to support our beautiful, cute, wonderful, president ✨🤩🙈 in his journey to getting re-elected. but today I HAVE CHANGED MY MIND! once i downloaded this app, my phone got flooded with viruses and trump ads everywhere. IT DOESNT STOP!! and then, to make matters worse. 😡😡😡i emailed the white house and they told me to go away and that they hoped my dog died. that is INCREDIBLY RUDE!
so anyway 😣 for the sake of my dog 🐕 and your phone 📱 do NOT download this app
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!

attributes.review: It took forever to download wasting my battery and making my phone heat up for no reason keep in mind my phone is brand new!! second, i keep getting pop-ups in the app along with my home screen THIS APP IS SPREADING VIRUSES!!! beware downloading this app unless you want permanent viruses. lastly, it doesn’t even work every-time i open it the app glitches out!! waste of my time!!!!
attributes.title: the worst DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: this app was the worst app EVER! i tried to download and it made my dog have a seizure. i mean who’s gonna pay for his dental insurance now? ridiculous. when the app finally downloaded the first thing that popped up was the ANNOYING ORANGE 🍊!! it was weird, they called him Donald instead but, isn’t that a duck? anyways now my couch is infected with roaches and i have no more lavender oils to help it. worst app ever get rid of it. ruined my life.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i thought it was a fun game similar to subway surfers, but oh was i wrong. instead, it sent me constant notifications- like 3 every minute to the point that my phone almost exploded. then it infected my phone with various bugs and viruses and i can't open my phone without being bombarded by pop ups and glitches. then once i actually opened the app, i was stunned by a picture of an old, obese, orange man that actually stunned me so much with his pure ugliness that i passed out and entered a coma for approx 18 days. if i could vote less than 1 star i would. please! remove! this! app!
attributes.title: i am absolutely scarred from this app

attributes.review: Horrible app. Don’t recommend. Messed up my phone so bad which is disappointed bc I wanted to see my favorite Cheeto 🥰😫. I would give a 0/5 stars if I could but sadly can’t 🥺😔. I actually did by 5 tickets for his upcoming rally but I need to wash my pet rock so sadly won’t be able to attend 😌😫. Please delete. This app hits 🦋🧚‍♀️✨💗 like domestic abuse 😌🥰🧚‍♀️✨🌈. In conclusion, I hate this app and it doesn’t deserve rights ✨✨✨✨🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🥰🥰
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to using this app to keep up but I have downloaded it over 5 times and it stays frozen on a screen for hours and then does now allow me to unlock my phone for a month straight. I have bought 2 new phones because of this please just get rid of this app its truly disappointing
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app in hopes to learn more about our cheeto of a president but unfortunately as soon as i got on the app i got shingles and had to go to the hospital. At the hospital the doctors realized i had a tumor in my brain which was caused by the negative energy this app gives off. i now only have 2 months left to live. do not let this app and this cheeto man take away your life.
attributes.title: Gave me shingles

attributes.review: This app is so horrible it has to many words, the app had so many bugs and made my phone so glitchy i had to throw it away and get a new one! Trump where's my check for this phone ?! Take down this app i don't want anything to happen to other people's phones😡. Some of the bugs even came out flying towards me it was a storm of bugs and i'm allergic!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
